remarks: Part 1.1 of Proposition 1 of [Baer] p. 110.  We use ` C ` , ` D ` , ` I ` , and ` J ` for Baer's u, v, s, and t.  Our unit vector ` E ` has the required properties for his w by ~ hdmapevec2 .  Our ` ( ( S `` D ) `` C ) ` means his f(u,v) (note argument reversal). (Contributed by NM, 12-Jun-2015.)
